data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_utilization IS NULL OR cpu_utilization < 85) AND (disk_queue_depth IS NULL OR disk_queue_depth < 5) AND (freeable_memory IS NULL OR freeable_memory > 200000000) AND (read_latency IS NULL OR read_latency < 0.1) AND (status IS NULL OR status = 'available') AND (write_latency IS NULL OR write_latency < 0.1)) AS 'Health Score' FROM amazon_rds_instance FACET amazon_rds_instance_name
SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_rds_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM amazon_rds_instance FACET amazon_rds_cluster_name

presentation.title: Cluster Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Cluster of this Instance

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_rds_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM amazon_rds_instance FACET class

presentation.title: Class Distribution
presentation.notes: The Class of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(amazon_rds_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM amazon_rds_instance FACET status

presentation.title: Status Distribution
presentation.notes: The Status of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_utilization) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Utilization (Percent)
presentation.notes: The CPU Utilization of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(read_iops) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read IOPS (per Second)
presentation.notes: The Read IOPS of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_iops) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write IOPS (per Second)
presentation.notes: The Write IOPS of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(network_receive_throughput) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Network Receive Throughput (Bytes per Second)
presentation.notes: The Network Receive Throughput of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(network_transmit_throughput) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Network Transmit Throughput (Bytes per Second)
presentation.notes: The Network Transmit Throughput of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(database_connections) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Database Connections
presentation.notes: The Database Connections of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(disk_queue_depth) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Disk Queue Depth
presentation.notes: The Disk Queue Depth of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(freeable_memory) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Freeable Memory (Bytes)
presentation.notes: The Freeable Memory of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(read_latency) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read Latency (Seconds)
presentation.notes: The Read Latency of the RDS Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_latency) FROM amazon_rds_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write Latency (Seconds)
presentation.notes: The Write Latency of the RDS Instance.
